docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: facts

apis.short_description: Upload facts for a host, creating the host if required

params.name: facts
params.description: hash containing the facts for the host

params.name: type
params.description: optional: the STI type of host to create

examples:
POST /api/hosts/facts
{
  "name": "brslc022.brs.infineon.com",
  "facts": {
    "is_virtual": "true",
    "processorcount": "2",
    "serialnumber": "VMware-56 4d 15 06 72 86 a9 d3-8a 09 fc 27 5a cf 00 45",
    "kernel": "Linux",

    "_timestamp": "2010-02-16 12:52:38.163833 +01:00",

500
{
  "error": {
    "message": "SQLite3::SQLException: table domains has no column named total_hosts: INSERT INTO \"domains\" (\"created_at\", \"dns_id\", \"fullname\", \"hostgroups_count\", \"name\", \"total_hosts\", \"updated_at\") VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"
  }
}
